comment: Highly disciplined and focused. Bhai ka rolla hai
name: Suraj Kumar Yadav

comment: An avid gym lover, very disciplined and punctual. My gym coach, always helps me out there and motivates me. Loves to play games and complete them. 3 Din me GTA 5 khatam kr diya 🫠. Abhi dekhna RDR2 do din me khatam kardega. His passion for gaming is unmatched.
name: R Harsh

comment: The epitome of discipline, with dedication to both gym and work. Yet, his zest for life never wavers, making him a steadfast friend. Handsome, fit, and fabulous! Wishing you all the best for your future endeavors and let's stay in touch!
name: Yuvaraj Merugu

comment: Omraj, my first roomie, is the epitome of discipline. His daily schedule, from sleep to wake-up, is a marvel to behold. A gym freak, "Bhai, meri b body bnwade !" He's always there to lend a hand, whether it's hitting the dance floor or standing up in a fight "Rod nikal BC"
name: Gaveesh Garg

comment: Bro you're one of the most dedicated and hardworking people I've seen. In the short time that we have been friends, I got a lot of inspiration from you. Your passion for digital art and the gym is unmatched. Wishing you the best! Cheers
name: R. Gokul

comment: "Hi Omraj! From first person to meet to the last day of college, sharing lots of memories - haircut, 54, Garbha night, Fluxus, and a lot. "Par first day! gate pe wait, phir wo ground reality of IIT, phir girls' hostel ke samne baithna, ke boys' hostel ka koi gate kholde🤣" . Hope to see you again"
name: Sanket Bhajgawali

comment: Bro is real life version of ‘JACK’ from ‘OGGY AND THE COCKROACHES’ duniya ka papa. Jokes aside one of the highly disciplined individuals that i had met so far whether it is academic or fitness. I won’t  be surprised if he is swimming his way towards gym if there is flood outside 😂.
name: Suryansh

comment:
Whether it's DJ night or Garba night, he is the best dance partner to give it a blast. Har party ke baad gala baith jata hai😂.
Gaadi chalana❌ saap banana✅
group❌ gang✅
always ready to fight(Rod kaha hai bc)
Rola hai bhai ka.
Best roommate and a friend to have.
Best wishes! See you soon, brother.
name: Dev Verma

comment:
Disciplined, hard working and a true Maharastrian. Loves gym more than anything. My anime and movie buddy.
Sabse best dance moves hai bhai ke. Fight ke liye always ready( Bas rod hona chahiye). Ladkiya hints to bahot deti hai bhai ko😊. Baaki Rola hai bhai ka. All the best bhai. Will miss you a lot.
name: Ritik Raj Soni
